message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $14,000. I believe it's a fantastic deal and would bring you a lot of value.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $11,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we discuss a price closer to $11,000? This would allow me to make the purchase while staying within my financial limits.
